article_title: Three Major Problems Left By Sec. Sebelius' Legacy

article_metadata.description: By Tarren Bragdon, CEO for the Foundation for Government Accountability. While Sec. Sebelius resigned in the shadow of a disastrous roll-out of healthcare.gov, her more damaging legacy is the temptation for state leaders to embrace a bigger welfare state and accept an injection of federal dollars funded by Medicare cuts and deficit spending.
article_metadata.author: The Apothecary
